name: Instant support chat
author: Promoheads

sections.description:
Free customer service chat for your website ! and go live in seconds !
View PromoLiveChat homepage http://promoheads.com/software.php

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Upload promolivechat.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Options page (Settings -> PromoLiveChat) and setup your support operators Jabber/XMPP accounts.
sections.faq:
What do I need to install the chat on the site?

Your site should operate on WordPress platform, and you will need to install the chat plug-in.

How can I configure the operators?

You need to login the site and enter Jabber/XMPP addresses, on which messages will be sent.

What kind of client software should be used for the support operator?

Any Jabber/XMPP client.

How many operators can I use?

At the moment, we allow up to 5 operators for free.

How fast is your chat service?

It runs in real time.

Can I perform the operatorâ€™s work by IOS or Android mobile devices?

Yes, you can.

Do you offer installation support ?

Yes, we do, contact us by IM at http://promoheads.com for assistance.
